description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Prepare to wage war against the evil Construct forces in this epic space shooter! - alone or with a wingman. Never before has war in space been this intense, or looked so good!
